Nous avons reçu des demandes de médias et lobbies pour expliquer ce que fait notre parti pour avoir une parité candidats/candidates. Voir la réponse ci-dessous. Nous avons choisi 2 candidates pour les 4 partielles pas pour la parité mais parce qu’elles étaient les meilleures.pic.twitter.com/u9OB9GA2am

We’ve received requests from media and one lobby group to explain what our party is doing to attain gender parity among our candidates. Below is the answer. Note that we chose two women for the four by-elections not to have parity but because they were the best candidates.pic.twitter.com/CGoA0Ixczs

I am so touched by the respectful decision of the PEI Liberals, PC's, and NDP to join PEI Greens in a suspension of campaign events this weekend to mourn the loss of Green candidate Josh Underhay. Prince Edward Island is a very special place.
